content: *a sweet gift for mother s day valentine s day or just because lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # 80018ad published in jo-ann skill level easy vanna s choice® article #860 2 colors 1 ball each *shown in pink & white* crochet hook - size g-6 4 mm split ring stitch markers 2 plastic safety eyes 6 mm diameter fiberfill stuffing some construction required to finish
